name: AUT_PROC_MODS_HX
description: This table contains information about the audit history of procedure modifiers. It extracts the related multiple response Authorization History - Procedure Modifiers (I AUT 1462) item. The current procedure modifier data is in AUT_PROC_MODS.

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the authorization record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PROC_MOD_ID
columns.description: Audits changes made to the modifiers of an authorization's procedure. Modifiers are extracted to the CLARITY_MOD table.

columns.name: PROC_MOD_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
